abstract: John Mensah (born 29 November 1982) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Nitra. Mensah spent the 2009–2010 and 2010–2011 seasons on loan at English club Sunderland in the Premier League. Mensah last played for Rennes in the French Ligue 1.
